meta.title: New Jersey Int. | Industrial Equipment & Services
meta.description: New Jersey Int. offers construction elevators, tower cranes, spare parts and maintenance services for construction projects in UAE.

hero.title: Elevating Construction Standards
hero.subtitle: Specialized in Construction Elevators, Tower Cranes, Spare Parts & Maintenance

intro.title: Welcome to New Jersey Int.
intro.content: We are a leading provider of industrial equipment and services in the UAE, specializing in construction elevators, tower cranes, spare parts, and maintenance services. With years of experience serving major contractors like JGG and Orbit, we deliver reliable solutions for all your construction needs.

construction_elevators.title: Construction Elevators
construction_elevators.description: High-quality external worker elevators for construction sites.

tower_cranes.title: Tower Cranes
tower_cranes.description: Potain and XCMG tower cranes for all your lifting needs.

spare_parts.title: Spare Parts
spare_parts.description: Genuine spare parts for elevators and cranes.

maintenance.title: Maintenance Services
maintenance.description: Professional maintenance to keep your equipment running smoothly.

cta.title: Ready to Elevate Your Construction Project?
cta.content: Contact us today to discuss your equipment needs and get a quote.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To provide high-quality construction equipment and exceptional service to our clients, enabling them to complete their projects safely and efficiently.

story.title: Our Story
story.content: New Jersey Int. has been serving the UAE construction industry for many years, building a reputation for reliability, quality, and excellent customer service. Our partnerships with leading manufacturers like Potain and XCMG allow us to offer the best equipment to our clients.

values.title: Our Values
values.quality_desc: We provide only the highest quality equipment and services.
values.reliability_desc: Our clients can depend on us for timely delivery and support.
values.expertise_desc: Our team has extensive knowledge in construction equipment.
values.customer_service_desc: We prioritize customer satisfaction in everything we do.

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.content: We work with leading manufacturers and contractors in the industry.

services.title: Our Services
services.intro: We offer a comprehensive range of services to meet all your construction equipment needs.

elevator_sales.title: Construction Elevator Sales
elevator_sales.description: We offer high-quality external worker elevators for construction sites of all sizes. Our elevators are reliable, safe, and comply with all safety standards.

crane_sales.title: Tower Crane Sales
crane_sales.description: We supply Potain and XCMG tower cranes for construction projects. Our cranes are designed for efficiency, safety, and durability.

spare_parts.title: Spare Parts Supply
spare_parts.description: We provide genuine spare parts for all the equipment we sell, ensuring optimal performance and longevity.

maintenance.title: Maintenance Services
maintenance.description: Our experienced technicians provide regular maintenance and emergency repair services to keep your equipment running smoothly and safely.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.intro: Explore our portfolio of equipment and projects.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: Get in touch with us for inquiries, quotes, or support.

form.name: Full Name
form.success: Your message has been sent successfully. We'll get back to you soon!
form.error: There was an error sending your message. Please try again or contact us directly.
